nodes.html: <a href="https://www.services.bis.gov.in/php/BIS_2.0/bisconnect/knowyourstandards/indian_standards/isdetails" target="_blank" data-title="The 'Know Your Standard' feature provides you a one-stop access to all the documents and data related to your Standard. Your Standard can be searched by entering the Indian Standard (IS) Number or a Keyword (like Product name) in the search box. After selecting the desired Standard from the list, this interface will provide you the basic details of Standard along-with links to download the Standard, Amendments, Gazette Document, related Product manual and Scheme of Inspection & Testing. Further, details of Laboratories where testing facilities are available, details of existing Licenses, details of classification and cross-references of IS, etc. is also available on the interface." aria-label="Know Your Standards" id="KnowStandards" onclick="return confirm('This link will redirect to another BIS application.')" onkeypress="return confirm('This link will redirect to another BIS application.')" role="link">
